POLYTECHNIC/COURSE  COURSE REQUIREMENTS   UTME SUBJECTS  REMARKS/WAIVER  
FEDPO-MUB  
LASPOTECH  
RUGIPO  
  
  
  
  
HORTICULTURE AND  
LANDSCAPE TECHNOLOGY 
FEDPO-AIU  
  
   h. RUGIPO requires five (5) O’ level credit passes to 
include Biology/Agricultural Science, 
Mathematics, Chemistry and two (2) from 
Geography, Economics, English Language and 
Physics. It requires at least ‘O’ level pass in 
English Language.  
i. FEDFISH-LAG requires ‘O’ level credit passes in 
English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, 
Biology/ Agricultural Science and any other 
Science or Social Science subject.  
j. FECOFOR-IBD requires Biology/Agricultural 
Science and two (2) of Physics, Chemistry, 
Mathematics, Econo mics and Geography as 
UTME subjects.  
k. COLAGRIC-YAN requires Biology and any two (2) 
of Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, Agricultural 
Science, Economics/Geography as UTME 
subjects.  
  
  
UTME SUBJECTS  
a) FEDFISH -LAG requires Chemistry, 
Biology/Agricultural Science and any one (1) of 
Economics, Geography, Physics or Mathematics.
